articles.author: Yang Jie
articles.title: Apple Looks to Boost Production Outside China
articles.description: The iPhone maker has told some of its suppliers that it wants to boost production outside China, citing Beijing’s strict anti-Covid policy among other reasons, and is giving India and Vietnam a closer look, people involved in the discussions said.
